data.title: Rota Temporis - Songs, Events and Music Stats
data.meta_description: Rota Temporis: Listen to new and popular songs, find events, look into their stats and see who their fans are.
data.text:
Italian-born Rota Temporis is a member of the European music scene. Rota Temporis is known as one of the most sincere and passionate artists in the genre, with a style that is firmly based in Italian folk music. The artist's distinctive fusion of traditional and modern components produces a setting that is both classic and modern.

The music of Rota Temporis is distinguished by its use of traditional instruments like the mandolin, accordion, and guitar, drawing inspiration from Italy's rich cultural past. Together with the dramatic orchestration, the artist's passionate vocals provide a sound that is both intensely personal and universally resonant.

The music of Rota Temporis is a celebration of the country's long history and diverse culture, and it is clear that the musician is passionate about it. Rota Temporis is a true powerhouse in the world of European, Italian folk music, with an uncompromising dedication to authenticity and a sound that is both classic and modern.

Italian group Rota Temporis is a sensation in the European folk music scene and is renowned for their original interpretations of classic Italian songs. Numerous of their songs have become favorites among listeners as their music has grown in popularity. They have a number of great songs, including "Song Of Exile," "Rokatanc," "La Suite Meurtriere," "Brunilde," "Totus Floreo," "Palastinalied," "Tanzen Wir Ohne Ende," "Platerspiele," "In Incipit," and "Ai vist lo lop."

With its eerie tune and moving lyrics that discuss the anguish of separation and longing for home, "Song Of Exile" distinguishes out. With its exuberant speed and appealing tune, the peppy music "Rokatanc" gets the crowd dancing. The instrumental masterpiece "La Suite Meurtriere" demonstrates the band's artistic mastery. A passionate ballad with stirring words and a catchy melody, "Brunilde" touches the heart. With its upbeat melody and inspirational words, "Totus floreo" is a joyful celebration of life and love.

A historical tune called "Palastinalied" describes the Crusades and the strife between Christians and Muslims. The upbeat dance number "Tanzen Wir Ohne Ende" gets the crowd grooving with its contagious beat. "Platerspiele" is a lighthearted and entertaining song that highlights the band's diversity and originality. With its ethereal melody and menacing vocals, "In Incipit" is a hauntingly beautiful composition that captures the attention of the listener. A traditional Occitan song called "Ai vist lo lop" exemplifies the band's respect for and love of traditional European folk music.

Overall, Rota Temporis is a gifted collection of musicians that have succeeded in giving traditional Italian folk music a fresh new sound, resulting in a distinctive and alluring sound that has captured the attention of audiences all throughout Europe and beyond. Their best songs are evidence of both their musical skill and their capacity to emotionally engage listeners.

The Italian folk music group Rota Temporis has put out some outstanding music over the years. Their most recent albums, "Noctu igne" and "Decimo," both of which were published in 2018, highlight their distinctive fusion of traditional and modern music. The group has succeeded in developing a sound that is both fresh and recognizable, entrancing listeners with their music.

Their most recent song, "Alla Conquista Degli Oceani," which was released in 2017, is evidence of how versatile they are as a group. The song instantly becomes popular with listeners thanks to its fast speed and appealing chorus. This track is a testament to the band's creative brilliance because it demonstrates how they can meld many genres together smoothly.

Overall, Rota Temporis has succeeded in producing a sound that is both distinctive and alluring. Every song they release demonstrates their love for what they do, which is reflected in their music. For fans of both traditional and modern folk music, their most recent CD and song are essential listening. We are forward to hear what the band releases next because they have a promising future ahead of them.
